pageTitle: Itinerary for Saturday, July 22, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Saturday, July 22, 2017:

Halifax, Nova Scotia

1:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the Halifax Pride Parade.

Halifax, Nova Scotia

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity for accredited media
  • Accredited media should gather at the corner of Barrington and Cogswell no later than 12:45 p.m.

Toronto, Ontario

5:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a plaque unveiling and will deliver remarks to celebrate the 10th Anniversary of the BAPS Shri Swaminarayan Mandir.

BAPS Shri Swaminarayan Mandir
61 Claireville Drive
Toronto, Ontario            

Notes for media:

  • Media should arrive no later than 4:30 p.m.
  • Photo opportunity for greeting and plaque unveiling
  • Open coverage for remarks at main stage
